body.p:
To his Excellency Thos E Bramlette
Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

Whereas at the March Term of the Pulaski Circuit Court 1864. A Fine was assessed in favor of the Commonwealth in two cases against Albert Simpson For tipling of $6000 each. the undersigned Petitioners would respectfully request Your Honor to remit said fines. Said Simpson is a verry poor man and is not able to pay said fines and support his large family of children and by so doing you will much oblige your Humble Petitioners

June 19th 1865 --
W R Smith
J C Owens
G. T. W. Barnell
John Whitaker
E, S, Brinkley
Cy. Childers
J. Adkins
J. Debord
W. Woodall
